price: 38. En degenen die de roep van hun Heer beantwoorden en hun gebeden perfect verrichten, en die hun zaken onderling overleggen en die datgene wat Wij hen gegeven hebben uitgeven;
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمۡرُهُمۡ شُورَىٰ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna is'tajābū lirabbihim wa-aqāmū al-ṣalata wa-amruhum shūrā baynahum wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
